headline: PTC Inc. (PTC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on PTC Inc. (PTC) on Twitter by TMTMoats. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PTC. PTC Inc. (PTC)’s share was trading at $157 as of March 12th. PTC’s trailing and forward P/E were 48.31 and 27.70 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. PTC, a leader in product and […]

headline: PTC Appoints Trac Pham to Board of Directors
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced that it has appointed Trac Pham to its Board of Directors, effective March 17, 2025.

headline: Reflecting On Design Software Stocks’ Q4 Earnings: PTC (NASDAQ:PTC)
summary: Looking back on design software stocks’ Q4 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including PTC (NASDAQ:PTC) and its peers.
